ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: because your Lord has inspired it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For your Lord will have commanded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: for your Lord will have commanded her (to do so).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: having been inspired by your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Because your Lord sent a command to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Because your Lord will inspire it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Because your Lord had inspired her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for that her Lord has inspired her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for your Lord has so directed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Because thy Lord will inspire her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: for her Lord will have inspired her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For that thy Lord will have given her inspiration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Because your Lord has inspired it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for your Lord will have revealed to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For your Lord will have inspired it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Because your Lord has commanded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [99:5] for its Lord will have inspired it, that is, He will have commanded her to [do] this — in a hadīth [it is stated], ‘It [the earth] shall testify to every single deed committed by every servant and handmaiden upon its surface’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Because thy Lord inspires her) because your Lord gives her leave to talk.
